QuestData.Title: King of the Breezestriders
QuestData.Description: Let me guess, you found it in a talbuk's flank?$B$B<Laara seems lost in thought for a moment.>$B$BThat arrow was intended for Tall Buck, king of the Breezestriders. Another talbuk - the one you killed - jumped in the way as I was taking my shot.$B$BI suggest you go after the king. When I was hunting him, he seemed fond of the pond at Lonely Falls to the south.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: King of all the talbuk in Nagrand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Tall Buck's Tail from Tall Buck.
QuestData.CompletionText: How goes the hunt for Tall Buck?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. You succeeded where I did not.$B$BPerhaps you outsiders aren't such bad hunters after all.
